TITLE: Episode 56 - Free Your Children from Prison
DESCRIPTION: Long time friend of the show and of the MLGA Network, the Stead at Home Mom, Nicole Parks, joins Maddie and Jessie to talk about ways to make homeschooling a viable option for your kids and your families, why the public school system is a big fat failure, and how taking the responsibility of educating your children back will strengthen your communities. Liberty, sadly, isn’t taught in schools and as we all know, it has to start at home home.
